title: Some Travelers Abused Disability Accommodations. Now Comes the Crackdown.
author: Jacob Passy
description: Theme parks and airlines are turning to third parties to figure out who gets some kinds of assistance. Disabled people and their families say the new processes present new obstacles.
cleaned_text: Aug. 23, 2023 9:00 pm ET Theme parks, airlines and other businesses are stepping up efforts to weed out abuse by opportunists pretending to be disabled to save money or cut long lines.
